data.eml:eml: Discovery of a new species belonging to the genus Heinrichiellus Tereshkin (Ichneumonidae, Ichneumoninae, Platylabini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kikuchi, Namiki, Konishi, Kazuhiko (2015): Discovery of a new species belonging to the genus Heinrichiellus Tereshkin (Ichneumonidae, Ichneumoninae, Platylabini). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 45: 31-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.45.5301, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.45.5301
